QuestData.Title: WANTED: The Heart of Quagmirran
QuestData.Description: I have an unusual request. A certain wealthy individual that I am in contact with off-world is interested in a macabre piece.$B$BSpecifically, she wants the heart of Quagmirran.$B$BI hear that the beast has three, but one will suffice for our purposes. As I understand it, you can find Quagmirran resting within a deep pool of water at the Slave Pens.
QuestData.LogDescription: Wind Trader Zhareem has asked you to obtain The Heart of Quagmirran. Deliver it to him in Shattrath's Lower City to collect the reward.$B$BThis quest may only be completed on Heroic difficulty.
QuestData.CompletionText: I trust that you know of a way to preserve the heart in transit?
QuestData.RewardText: Now that I think of it, it's a pity I didn't ask you to return with the other two hearts as well. Perhaps next time. In any case, you've earned your commission.$B$BCome back tomorrow and I will have another request for you to fulfill.
